username.title: User username
username.description: User username. Can contain: any letter or number and any of the following special characters: [_, $, @, !]. Must be at least 2 characters long.

password.title: User password
password.description: User password. Can contain: any letter or number and any of the following special characters: [_, @, $, !, %, *, ?, &]. Must be at least 4 character long.

role.title: User role
role.description: Roles that define user access rights. Can be either 'admin' or 'user'.
